boolean.name: isEnabledProductDescriptionCopy
boolean.title: Enable product description copy
boolean.help: This configuration controls whether the product description from the product record is displayed on stock move lines in a description field.

boolean.name: requireToFillConformityOnReceipt
boolean.title: Require to fill conformity for products ticked 'Control on Receipt'
boolean.help: When enabled, this configuration makes it mandatory to fill in the Conformity field on stock move lines of receipt orders, requiring a conformity check before a product enters stock. This applies to products with the Control on receipt checkbox ticked in the stock tab of their product record.

boolean.name: isSeparateShipmentOperations
boolean.title: Separate the shipment operations
boolean.help: When enabled, this option adds two menu entries (Availability request in Sales and Customer shipments to prepare in Stock / Deliveries) as well as 2 checkboxes on stock moves (Availability request and Picking order printed). Sales representatives can indicate to preparers which orders need to be prepared for shipment. Once the order is prepared, sales representatives will be informed.

boolean.name: isRequiredShipmentSupplierDetails
boolean.title: Require to fill the shipment information
boolean.help: When enabled, this configuration requires filling in the Supplier shipment date and Supplier shipment reference when realizing a supplier receipt.

many-to-one.name: economicArea
many-to-one.help: This field is only useful for customs duties related to a stock move. It defines in which economic area the company is located.

many-to-one.name: stockUnit
many-to-one.title: Default unit
many-to-one.help: Default unit when creating a new product.

boolean.name: activateTrackingNumberBarCodeGeneration
boolean.title: Activate bar code generation for tracking number
boolean.help: When enabled, it becomes possible to generate barcodes for tracking numbers.

boolean.name: editTrackingNumberBarcodeType
boolean.title: Specify the barcode type by tracking number configuration
boolean.help: When enabled, you can specify at the tracking number configuration level the barcode type that will be generated for tracking numbers linked to this configuration. When disabled, the default barcode type will be the one defined in the adjacent field Tracking number barcode type.

many-to-one.name: trackingNumberBarcodeTypeConfig
many-to-one.title: Tracking number barcode type
many-to-one.help: Barcode type that will be used by default on tracking numbers.

boolean.name: activateStockLocationBarCodeGeneration
boolean.title: Activate bar code generation for stock location
boolean.help: When enabled, it becomes possible to generate barcodes for stock locations.

boolean.name: editStockLocationBarcodeType
boolean.title: Specify the barcode type by stock location
boolean.help: When enabled, you can specify at each stock location level the barcode type that will be generated for that location. When disabled, the default barcode type will be the one defined in the adjacent field Stock location barcode type.

many-to-one.name: stockLocationBarcodeTypeConfig
many-to-one.title: Stock location barcode type
many-to-one.help: Barcode type that will be used by default on stock locations.

boolean.name: isManageStockLocationOnStockMoveLine
boolean.title: Manage stock location on stock move lines
boolean.help: When enabled, it is possible to manage stock locations at the stock move line level, not just globally on the stock move. Note that on a stock move line, only sub-locations of the parent location selected in the stock move header can be selected.

boolean.name: isIncotermEnabled
boolean.title: Enable incoterm
boolean.help: This checkbox enables the incoterms feature, which can be configured in the corresponding menu entry under the configuration menu of the stock module.
